attributes.action: consider allowing the same rights to the elderly on Attendance Allowance as those who receive Disablity Living Allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Being old and disable doesn’t mean we should be forgotten.  At present it seems once you have reached the “Golden Years” and you become disable you are far less important and should not be even thinking of trying to carry on and live as normal a life as possible.  At present those on Attendance Allowance are excluded from the mobility scheme, road tax exemption, extra heating allowance etc.  To receive the same benefits as those on Disability Living Allowance would enhance thousands of disabled pensioners lives.
